Articles.Content:
Found this while trawling YouTube, besides looking super sweet the article also mentions fuel efficiency bumps and an added cooling barrier thanks to the airflow. But when I tried to check out more about these I couldn't find much, just a couple companies in a quick search. So what do you guys think?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pDfHUYXZxbs

http://www.smithsonianmag.com/smart-news/this-new-rocket-engine-has-a-fuel-tornado-inside-169311761/?no-ist
